name: Helium Network
reason: The 'Flagship' of Physical DePIN. Manages the network state. Higher insider score due to original a16z backing.

name: Helium Mobile
reason: Sub-DAO token for 5G coverage. Directly tied to subscriber revenue and hardware deployment. Productive.

name: Helium IOT
reason: Sub-DAO token for LoRaWAN. Used for sensor data transfer. High utility, moderate inflation.

name: Hivemapper
reason: Decentralized Google Maps. Hardware requirement (Dashcam) acts as 'Proof of Work'. High merit.

name: Natix Network
reason: Smartphone-based mapping. Lower barrier to entry than Hivemapper (softer Proof of Work), higher tariff.

name: WiFi Map
reason: Crowdsourced WiFi hotspots. Utility-driven, though incentive model is highly inflationary.

name: Onde Network
reason: Renewable energy trading. Tokenizing physical kilowatts. Solid real-world link.
